data.text: @igordownunder @PhysicsToday @APSphysics Common sense is the least common of all senses, yet every i met seems to have it 🤣

@igordownunder @PhysicsToday @APSphysics Im pretty confident his 500k km/year seemed common sense  to him at the time of flying. Anyways, im certainly not advocating for an administrator to tell us how much to travel. But then, how to limit this kind of excess, very relevant to sustainability?

@igordownunder @PhysicsToday @APSphysics I was also shocked. Not that I want to be the traveling police 🤣
But the environmental impact of this 1 person is huge, and im afraid there are/were many others like him. Travel is  necessary in physics. But should there be some restraint/limit for individuals?

@hybridLinn @PhysicsToday @APSphysics Indeed! Honestly though, Im more dissapointed at Physics Today than at the author.
